channel.title: Yes Man (2008)
channel.description:
I was just in Boston and went to Loews Theaters to see the movie Yes Man with Jim Carrey.
Not to give away any crucial details, the movie is about a man who lives out his mundane, boring job and to every opportunity, he says No. One of his old buddies is now completely different and invites Jim Carrey to come to a special meeting and surprisingly Carrey says yes. He goes to the meeting and does the most amazing thing in his life, says yes... to everything! And the story goes on.
I truly have an outlook as that in life but I feel that seeing this movie brought that into respect where I can appreciate it and increase it. Such as now I will know that when I say No I will be turning down what could be a life changing opportunity. It's just interesting. I'm sure it's more interesting because I saw it high but it was still a good movie no doubt. :)
8/10
~Ron

item.title: Yes Man (2008)
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:3, topic:252879”][quote author=the bank link=topic=334045.msg2602479#msg2602479 date=1230337249]
He gets in a car accident and realizes that he can’t say no to everything because his girlfriend left him because she thinks that he just lied about all the times he said Yes so then he realizes that he has to learn to say no aswell as yes so he borrows a motorcycle and makes things all better.

There, I just saved you a two hours of suffering from lack of jokes.
[/quote]
You are a dick[/quote]
i concur
@topic: i got sent like invites to the event of it on facebook and i was like wtf? so i looked into it and it looks shit

item.title: Yes Man (2008)
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Not a fan, predicatable storyline and recycled jokes. Getting pretty sick of the same elastic face pulling he’s been doing for 15 years. It gets to a point where you think; grow up.

I was just in Boston and went to Loews Theaters to see the movie Yes Man with Jim Carrey.

Not to give away any crucial details, the movie is about a man who lives out his mundane, boring job and to every opportunity, he says No. One of his old buddies is now completely different and invites Jim Carrey to come to a special meeting and surprisingly Carrey says yes.
